thread.section_title: Frames Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Frames Direct | www.framesdirect.com | 9 of 657
thread.title: Fernando Torres
thread.title_full: Frames Direct reviewed by Fernando Torres

author: Fernando Torres
title: Fernando Torres
text: I ordered prescription sunglasses over the internet. The customer service representative gave me an accurate time when they would be delivered. The only issue was being sent non-prescription sunglasses before the correct order, but that was cleared up quickly.
